channel.title: LCD Display on Pi4J
channel.description: Recent content in LCD Display on Pi4J

item.title: LCD Display
item.description: Description The LcdDisplay is a template class, that you can use in your own Java-project. It is used to show Numbers, Text and Symbols on a small Display. The Class supports only LCD Displays with the PCF8574T I2C Backpack. Supported display-dimensions are 40x2, 20x4, 20x2, 16x2, 16x1. IF YOU CAN’T SEE ANYTHING WRITTEN ON THE DISPLAY, TRY TO SET THE CONTRAST BY TURNING THE CONTRAST-SCREW AT THE BACK WITH A SCREWDRIVER.
